alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 12 at 3:49AM MDT until October 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Kiowa County and Eastern Kiowa County Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Western Kiowa County
